description: This file defines a custom web component 'todo-item' using LitElement, representing a single to-do item with functionalities like toggle, edit, and delete, including associated styles and event handling.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: A LitElement-based web component for individual to-do list items, supporting editing, toggling completion, and deletion.

methods.name: #toggleTodo
methods.description: Dispatches an event to toggle the completion status of the to-do item.

methods.name: #deleteTodo
methods.description: Dispatches an event to delete the to-do item.

methods.name: #beginEdit
methods.description: Sets the component into editing mode.

methods.name: #finishEdit
methods.description: Dispatches an event with the updated text to finish editing.

methods.name: #captureEscape
methods.description: Handles escape key to abort editing.

methods.name: #abortEdit
methods.description: Resets the input value to the original text if editing is aborted.
